description: This file defines an authoringService object providing methods for managing learning paths and courses via API calls, including listing, creating, updating, and deleting entities.

methods.name: listPaths
methods.description: Fetches a list of all learning paths, including drafts.

methods.name: createPath
methods.description: Creates a new learning path with provided payload.

methods.name: updatePath
methods.description: Updates an existing learning path identified by id.

methods.name: deletePath
methods.description: Deletes a learning path by id.

methods.name: listCourses
methods.description: Fetches a list of all courses, including drafts.

methods.name: createCourse
methods.description: Creates a new course with provided payload.

methods.name: updateCourse
methods.description: Updates an existing course identified by id.
